h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Upper Pagoda (Level 4)

After you defeat the lone archer guarding the ramp up out of the prison, you may notice any current curse applied to you will dissipate the moment you reach the top! You can celebrate this breath of fresh air, just be wary of a Frozen Corpse waiting to try and attack you as you cross the last wooden beam.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the "Upper Pagoda (Level 4)" section of the document titled "The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm." It shows a character standing on a snowy ledge, holding a glowing staff, and looking towards a precarious, icy bridge. This moment follows the defeat of a lone archer and the removal of a curse, as described in the preceding text. The character must now be cautious of a Frozen Corpse as they prepare to cross the final wooden beam.
